quote: My thoughts on gay marriage are that everyone has the right to love and be loved, and that's the position I take.

author: Socrates

quote: Love: A temporary insanity curable by marriage.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: If you want to read about love and marriage, you've got to buy two separate books.

quote: Instead of getting married again, I'm going to find a woman I don't like and give her a house.

quote: Sleeping together is a euphemism for people, but tantamount to marriage with cats.
author: Marge Piercy

quote: Marriage, if one will face the truth, is an evil, but a necessary evil.
author: Menander

quote: Every marriage tends to consist of an aristocrat and a peasant. Of a teacher and a learner.
author: John Updike

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Happy is the man who finds a true friend, and far happier is he who finds that true friend in his wife.
author: Franz Schubert

quote: The real act of marriage takes place in the heart, not in the ballroom or church or synagogue. It's a choice you make - not just on your wedding day, but over and over again - and that choice is reflected in the way you treat your husband or wife.

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.

quote: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.

quote: My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.

quote: Let the wife make the husband glad to come home, and let him make her sorry to see him leave.

quote: I do believe that God blessed me in life with a wonderful family, a successful career, and a loving marriage, and remain thankful for that blessing.

quote: A good husband makes a good wife.

quote: May these vows and this marriage be blessed.
author: Rumi

quote: A wedding is a funeral where you smell your own flowers.

quote: One should believe in marriage as in the immortality of the soul.

quote: Don't marry the person you think you can live with; marry only the individual you think you can't live without.

quote: Marriage is an alliance entered into by a man who can't sleep with the window shut, and a woman who can't sleep with the window open.

quote: Friendship is the marriage of the soul, and this marriage is liable to divorce.

quote: A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short.

quote: Ultimately, I believe the only secret to a happy marriage is choosing the right person. Life is a series of choices, right?

quote: The problem with marriage is that it ends every night after making love, and it must be rebuilt every morning before breakfast.

quote: I opposed the Defense of Marriage Act in 1996. It should be repealed and I will vote for its repeal on the Senate floor. I will also oppose any proposal to amend the U.S. Constitution to ban gays and lesbians from marrying.

quote: If I get married, I want to be very married.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: I think women are natural caretakers. They take care of everybody. They take care of their husbands and their kids and their dogs, and don't spend a lot of time just getting back and taking time out.

quote: All married couples should learn the art of battle as they should learn the art of making love. Good battle is objective and honest - never vicious or cruel. Good battle is healthy and constructive, and brings to a marriage the principles of equal partnership.

quote: Sensual pleasures have the fleeting brilliance of a comet; a happy marriage has the tranquillity of a lovely sunset.
author: Ann Landers

quote: I think the best thing I can do is to be a distraction. A husband lives and breathes his work all day long. If he comes home to more table thumping, how can the poor man ever relax?

quote: Marrying for love may be a bit risky, but it is so honest that God can't help but smile on it.

quote: Before marriage, a girl has to make love to a man to hold him. After marriage, she has to hold him to make love to him.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Originally, I was against gay marriage because I was opposed to all marriage, being an old-fashioned gay bohemian. The straight people I knew in the sixties were very much opposed to it. I was, too, and it was never a possibility for gays, but when I saw how opposed the Religious Right was to it, I thought it a fight worth fighting.
author: Edmund White

quote: The Hindu marriage may be described as the union of two families. In this union, there is no room for petty ambitions and personal ego-trips. What is involved is love for the entire family that one is marrying into.
author: Dada Vaswani

quote: I had a realization in the midst of my happy marriage that I had kind of lost most of my friends - my male friends in particular. And I started wondering if my wife, who was certainly my best friend, supplanted those relationships.
author: Matthew Weiner

quote: The United States is in a time of transition. Courts have redefined marriage, and beliefs about human sexuality are changing. Will the right to dissent be protected? Will the right of Americans to speak and act in accord with what the United States had always believed about marriage - that it's a union of husband and wife - be tolerated?
author: Edwin Meese

quote: For the life of me, I don't understand what honest motive there is in putting this in front of this body to philosophically debate marriage on a constitutional amendment that is not going to happen, and which is enormously divisive in all of our communities.
author: Dianne Feinstein

quote: Sleeping together is a euphemism for people, but tantamount to marriage with cats.
author: Marge Piercy

quote: Marriage, if one will face the truth, is an evil, but a necessary evil.
author: Menander

quote: Political promises are much like marriage vows. They are made at the beginning of the relationship between candidate and voter, but are quickly forgotten.
author: Dick Gregory

quote: There may be people in my audience who may not agree with me on some particular issue - you know, say, as a gun owner, they may not agree with me, or, you know, someone may not agree with me on a gay marriage topic. Any of those things. But those shouldn't be the reasons you listen to my music.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: Every marriage tends to consist of an aristocrat and a peasant. Of a teacher and a learner.
author: John Updike

quote: We're used to boy meets girl, boy likes girl, instant attraction on TV. But you throw a son in there, you throw a marriage in there, and you've got some really good character stuff.
author: Matt Passmore

quote: The irrationality of disgust suggests it is unreliable as a source of moral insight. There may be good arguments against gay marriage, partial-birth abortions and human cloning, but the fact that some people find such acts to be disgusting should carry no weight.
author: Paul Bloom

quote: I made an awful mess of my first marriage. It was hard to live with me being me. I was so abnormal. I mean, most writers struggle. I hadn't struggled. I couldn't suddenly go down to the PEN Club and behave like a normal human being, because most of those guys were struggling to make a couple of thousand pounds a year.
author: John le Carre

quote: The Obama administration came into Utah and said, 'We're not going to listen to what the U.S. Supreme Court said. 'We, the federal government, are going to recognize marriages in the state of Utah and Utah state law explicitly does not recognize as marriage,' and that was really, in my view, an abuse of power.
author: Ted Cruz

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Happy is the man who finds a true friend, and far happier is he who finds that true friend in his wife.
author: Franz Schubert

quote: The real act of marriage takes place in the heart, not in the ballroom or church or synagogue. It's a choice you make - not just on your wedding day, but over and over again - and that choice is reflected in the way you treat your husband or wife.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
author: Julia Child

quote: My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Let the wife make the husband glad to come home, and let him make her sorry to see him leave.
author: Martin Luther

quote: I do believe that God blessed me in life with a wonderful family, a successful career, and a loving marriage, and remain thankful for that blessing.
author: Bonnie Tyler

quote: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: When a man opens a car door for his wife, it's either a new car or a new wife.
author: Prince Philip

quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years.
author: Simone Signoret

quote: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
author: Martin Luther

quote: A good husband makes a good wife.
author: John Florio

quote: A word of encouragement from a teacher to a child can change a life. A word of encouragement from a spouse can save a marriage. A word of encouragement from a leader can inspire a person to reach her potential.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: May this marriage be full of laughter, our every day in paradise.
author: Rumi

quote: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight, dinner, soft music and dancing. She goes Tuesdays, I go Fridays.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
author: Socrates

quote: Marriage, in its truest sense, is a partnership of equals, with neither exercising dominion over the other, but, rather, with each encouraging and assisting the other in whatever responsibilities and aspirations he or she might have.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: I believe marriage is between a man and a woman. I am not in favor of gay marriage. But when you start playing around with constitutions, just to prohibit somebody who cares about another person, it just seems to me that's not what America's about. Usually, our constitutions expand liberties, they don't contract them.
author: Barack Obama

quote: May these vows and this marriage be blessed.
author: Rumi

quote: A wedding is a funeral where you smell your own flowers.
author: Eddie Cantor

quote: One should believe in marriage as in the immortality of the soul.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Marriage is an act of will that signifies and involves a mutual gift, which unites the spouses and binds them to their eventual souls, with whom they make up a sole family - a domestic church.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: A successful marriage is an edifice that must be rebuilt every day.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: Marriage is the most natural state of man, and... the state in which you will find solid happiness.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Marriage is good for those who are afraid to sleep alone at night.
author: St. Jerome

quote: When marrying, ask yourself this question: Do you believe that you will be able to converse well with this person into your old age? Everything else in marriage is transitory.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Don't marry the person you think you can live with; marry only the individual you think you can't live without.
author: James Dobson

quote: Marriage is an alliance entered into by a man who can't sleep with the window shut, and a woman who can't sleep with the window open.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: I have learned that only two things are necessary to keep one's wife happy. First, let her think she's having her own way. And second, let her have it.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Friendship is the marriage of the soul, and this marriage is liable to divorce.
author: Voltaire

quote: A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: Ultimately, I believe the only secret to a happy marriage is choosing the right person. Life is a series of choices, right?
author: Michelle Pfeiffer

quote: When you make the sacrifice in marriage, you're sacrificing not to each other but to unity in a relationship.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Let us be honest with each other. The threat to marriage is not the gays. It is a lack of loving commitment - whether it is found in the form of neglect, indifference, cruelty or adultery, to name just a few manifestations of the loveless desert in which too many marriages come to grief.
author: Malcolm Turnbull

quote: Getting married, for me, was the best thing I ever did. I was suddenly beset with an immense sense of release, that we have something more important than our separate selves, and that is the marriage. There's immense happiness that can come from working towards that.
author: Nick Cave

quote: The secret to a happy marriage is if you can be at peace with someone within four walls, if you are content because the one you love is near to you, either upstairs or downstairs, or in the same room, and you feel that warmth that you don't find very often, then that is what love is all about.
author: Bruce Forsyth

quote: Marriage has made me a lot happier and I'm deeply in love with my wife, and I thank God for her every day.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: Marriage is a coming together for better or for worse, hopefully enduring, and intimate to the degree of being sacred.
author: William O. Douglas

quote: My mother and father had a terrible marriage. They celebrated their wedding anniversary one year with their friends. Why did they celebrate? Maybe because they had lasted so many years without killing each other.
author: Marina Abramovic

quote: The great secret of a successful marriage is to treat all disasters as incidents and none of the incidents as disasters.
author: Harold Nicolson

quote: A man in love is incomplete until he has married. Then he's finished.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: Marriage is a wonderful institution, but who wants to live in an institution?
author: Groucho Marx

quote: But marriage goes in waves. You've got to be patient. People bail and give up on their marriages way too early. They just don't put the work and the effort into it. You've got to suck up your ego a lot of times, because that can be a big downfall.
author: Anna Benson

quote: When I'm weak, you can be strong; when I'm strong, you can be weak. That's what I believe marriage is.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: A good marriage is one which allows for change and growth in the individuals and in the way they express their love.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: If you want to know how your girl will treat you after marriage, just listen to her talking to her little brother.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: To keep your marriage brimming, With love in the loving cup, Whenever you're wrong, admit it; Whenever you're right, shut up.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: Gay rights is just a matter of time. Look at the polls. Worrying about gay marriage, let alone gay civil unions or gay employment rights, is a middle-age issue. Young people just can't see the problem. At worst, gays are going to win this one just by waiting until the opposition dies off.
author: Gail Collins

quote: Marriage is about the most expensive way for the average man to get laundry done.
author: Burt Reynolds

quote: Well I don't know that I'm okay any more than anyone else is okay, I lead a happy life and a very full one - I have a happy marriage and my kids are all cheerful, and no one is finding fault with me, personally.
author: L. Ron Hubbard

quote: I'm not for gay marriage, but I'm not for discriminating against people.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I don't care how handsome or fabulous or funny the groom is, or how sweet and accommodating the bride, or vice versa. Marriage is hard.
author: Jenna McCarthy

quote: Love is not weakness. It is strong. Only the sacrament of marriage can contain it.
author: Boris Pasternak

quote: Marriage equality is not a choice. It is a legal right.
author: Cory Booker

quote: Marriage is neither heaven nor hell, it is simply purgatory.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Marriage is like a cage; one sees the birds outside desperate to get in, and those inside equally desperate to get out.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Wit is the sudden marriage of ideas which, before their union, were not perceived to have any relation.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Married men live longer than single men. But married men are a lot more willing to die.
author: Johnny Carson

quote: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: There were three of us in this marriage, so it was a bit crowded.
author: Princess Diana

quote: Marriage has a unique place because it speaks of an absolute faithfulness, a covenant between radically different persons, male and female; and so it echoes the absolute covenant of God with his chosen, a covenant between radically different partners.
author: Rowan Williams

quote: Nobody, man or woman, has ever wrecked a good marriage.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: You know, my friends, with what a brave carouse I made a Second Marriage in my house; favored old barren reason from my bed, and took the daughter of the vine to spouse.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: I respect the fact that many denominations have different points of view with respect to gay marriage and they can hold that in the sanctity in the place of their religion and not bless them or solemnize them.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Do you know what it means to come home at night to a woman who'll give you a little love, a little affection, a little tenderness? It means you're in the wrong house, that's what it means.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: In the face of love, everyone is equal. Let everyone have the freedom to love and to pursue their happiness. I am Tsai Ing-wen, and I support marriage equality.
author: Tsai Ing-wen

quote: The media seems to think only abortion and gay marriage are religious issues. Poverty is a moral issue, it's a faith issue, it's a religious issue.
author: Jim Wallis

quote: Same-sex marriage would eliminate entirely in law the basic idea of a mother and a father for every child. It would create a society which deliberately chooses to deprive a child of either a mother or a father.
author: Keith O'Brien

quote: I don't want to make any judgments, and I don't want to preach, but I'm hoping that marriage can work: that when people do fall in love, when people do find their soul mate, everyone sticks to it. It has the potential to be a very powerful thing, marriage.
author: Jonathan Silverman

quote: I love the concept of togetherness and the entwinement of marriage.
author: William Shatner

quote: But the key to our marriage is the capacity to give each other a break. And to realize that it's not how our similarities work together; it's how our differences work together.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: Marriage helps young couples to raise themselves towards God. The bond of marriage unites two souls so firmly that though they are physically two separate entities, their souls are merged into one harmonious whole.
author: Dada Vaswani

quote: If you want to sacrifice the admiration of many men for the criticism of one, go ahead, get married.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: People today expect too much from marriage. Getting married is really like taking on a big new job.
author: Rosamunde Pilcher

quote: Many women cut back what had to be done at home by redefining what the house, the marriage and, sometimes, what the child needs. One woman described a fairly common pattern: I do my half. I do half of his half, and the rest doesn't get done.
author: Arlie Russell Hochschild

quote: What is fascinating about marriage is why anyone wants to get married.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: Marriage may often be a stormy lake, but celibacy is almost always a muddy horse pond.
author: Thomas Love Peacock

quote: For me it's also - the music is equally as important. I mean I think as somebody who writes music, there just has to sort of be the marriage between both.
author: Katey Sagal

quote: I think that's one of the most difficult things in any marriage - in order to build anything, you must be together. You can't build anything over the telephone.
author: Julie London

quote: Marriage is the mother of the world. It preserves kingdoms, and fills cities and churches, and heaven itself.
author: Jeremy Taylor

quote: Sticking with a marriage. That's true grit, man.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: My grandparents got married at a very young age, and a lot of what I think about marriage is based on their relationship. I watched them over the years and saw how they dealt with everything together, as a team.
author: Kyle Chandler

quote: I have a lot of skepticism about marriage and monogamy.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: I am not married anymore. I hate marriage... but it's okay now.
author: Eric-Emmanuel Schmitt

quote: It only took one text message to change my life. That's when I discovered my loving husband had been unfaithful. His infidelities ended our marriage.
author: Garcelle Beauvais

quote: I am drawn to the mystery of marriage. You can never know what the contract is between two people, and that is a very strong subject. I think it may be my subject.
author: Mike Nichols

quote: I am a big, confident, happy woman who had a loving childhood, a pleasant career, and a wonderful marriage. I feel very lucky.
author: Maeve Binchy

quote: We need leaders who will stand unapologetically in defense of marriage.
author: Ted Cruz

quote: Marriage is about love, but it is not first and foremost about love. First and foremost, marriage is about continuity and transmission.
author: Meir Soloveichik

quote: The most happy marriage I can picture or imagine to myself would be the union of a deaf man to a blind woman.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: For my parents' generation, the idea was not that marriage was about some kind of idealized, romantic love; it was a partnership. It's about creating family; it's about creating offspring. Indian culture is essentially much more of a 'we' culture. It's a communal culture where you do what's best for the community - you procreate.
author: Aasif Mandvi

quote: I think men are mainly unfaithful because as they get older, they feel the urge to prove to themselves that they are still attractive. They need proof from outside the marriage. It's really sad. It's all about them. It's not about their wives at all.
author: Pattie Boyd

quote: My thoughts on gay marriage are that everyone has the right to love and be loved, and that's the position I take.
author: Nick Jonas

quote: So many people prefer to live in drama because it's comfortable. It's like someone staying in a bad marriage or relationship - it's actually easier to stay because they know what to expect every day, versus leaving and not knowing what to expect.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: As to marriage or celibacy, let a man take which course he will, he will be sure to repent.
author: Socrates

quote: Love: A temporary insanity curable by marriage.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: If you want to read about love and marriage, you've got to buy two separate books.
author: Alan King

quote: Marriage is a great institution, but I'm not ready for an institution.
author: Mae West

quote: I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: Marriage, for a woman at least, hampers the two things that made life to me glorious - friendship and learning.
author: Jane Harrison

quote: My wife is my soul mate. I can't imagine being without her.
author: Matt Damon

quote: Now that virtually every career is an option for ambitious girls, it can no longer be considered regressive or reactionary to reintroduce discussion of marriage and motherhood to primary education. We certainly do not want to return to the simplistic duality of home economics classes for girls and wood shop for boys.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: I liked the premise of this material. I love the marriage relationship. They kind of keep each other honest, and they enjoy each other's sense of humor. Kind of a sexy but boring relationship.
author: Patricia Arquette

quote: It is a full time job being honest one moment at a time, remembering to love, to honor, to respect. It is a practice, a discipline, worthy of every moment.
author: Jasmine Guy

quote: You're not just going out there, maybe sacrificing your own life. There's also sacrifices still going on at home. You can serve in the military and have a good marriage, but you just need to be aware of it so you can take those steps to take care of it.
author: Chris Kyle

quote: Marriage is not just spiritual communion, it is also remembering to take out the trash.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: A journey is like marriage. The certain way to be wrong is to think you control it.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: I married beneath me, all women do.
author: Nancy Astor

quote: I think long-lasting, healthy relationships are more important than the idea of marriage. At the root of every successful marriage is a strong partnership.
author: Carson Daly

quote: It's lovely being a parent and being in a strong marriage with somebody who is your best friend.
author: Johnny Vegas

quote: When the first fossils began to be found in eastern Africa, in the late 1950s, I thought, what a wonderful marriage this was, biology and anthropology. I was around 16 years old when I made this particular choice of academic pursuit.
author: Donald Johanson

quote: Well, my view before was a Western view, and I certainly understand marriage equality and civil rights, equal rights for all, but having visited developing nations and some of the poorest nations in the world, I realize how deep it goes and how much work really needs to be done to create equality for all.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: The problem for those who assert biblical authority in support of traditional definitions of marriage is that one could, with equal validity, assert that the lending of money or certain kinds of haircuts are forbidden by God, or that slavery and the subjugation of women are authorized by the Lord.
author: Jon Meacham

quote: The problem with marriage is that it ends every night after making love, and it must be rebuilt every morning before breakfast.
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: I opposed the Defense of Marriage Act in 1996. It should be repealed and I will vote for its repeal on the Senate floor. I will also oppose any proposal to amend the U.S. Constitution to ban gays and lesbians from marrying.
author: Barack Obama

quote: I'm 0 for 3 with marriage - the scoreboard doesn't lie, never has. So what we all have is a marriage of the heart. To sully or contaminate or radically disrespect this union with a shameful contract is something that I will leave to the amateurs and the Bible grippers.
author: Charlie Sheen

quote: If I get married, I want to be very married.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: I think women are natural caretakers. They take care of everybody. They take care of their husbands and their kids and their dogs, and don't spend a lot of time just getting back and taking time out.
author: Reese Witherspoon

quote: All married couples should learn the art of battle as they should learn the art of making love. Good battle is objective and honest - never vicious or cruel. Good battle is healthy and constructive, and brings to a marriage the principles of equal partnership.
author: Ann Landers

quote: Sensual pleasures have the fleeting brilliance of a comet; a happy marriage has the tranquillity of a lovely sunset.
author: Ann Landers

quote: I think the best thing I can do is to be a distraction. A husband lives and breathes his work all day long. If he comes home to more table thumping, how can the poor man ever relax?
author: Jackie Kennedy

quote: Marrying for love may be a bit risky, but it is so honest that God can't help but smile on it.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Before marriage, a girl has to make love to a man to hold him. After marriage, she has to hold him to make love to him.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Next month, I will celebrate my 30th anniversary of marriage with my beautiful bride, Vicki. Our marriage has been a blessing. I have gained even more respect for the institution over the past 3 decades and will defend it against attack.
author: Todd Tiahrt

quote: Mama and Daddy King represent the best in manhood and womanhood, the best in a marriage, the kind of people we are trying to become.
author: Coretta Scott King

quote: Olympism is the marriage of sport and culture.
author: Juan Antonio Samaranch

quote: I've always been suspicious of TV, I've always found music and video to be an unhappy marriage.
author: Keith Richards

quote: In marriage do thou be wise: prefer the person before money, virtue before beauty, the mind before the body; then thou hast a wife, a friend, a companion, a second self.
author: William Penn

quote: Bachelors know more about women than married men; if they didn't they'd be married too.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Marriage is a gamble, let's be honest.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: The possibility of divorce renders both marriage partners stricter in their observance of the duties they owe to each other. Divorces help to improve morals and to increase the population.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: I know one husband and wife who, whatever the official reasons given to the court for the break up of their marriage, were really divorced because the husband believed that nobody ought to read while he was talking and the wife that nobody ought to talk while she was reading.
author: Vera Brittain

quote: The president strongly believes that marriage in this country ought to be between a man and a woman. He also believes it is something that ought to be decided by the people. He doesn't believe that judges ought to impose their will on the people.
author: Ken Mehlman

quote: Europe, which gave us the idea of same-sex marriage, is a dying society, with birthrates 50 percent below replacement.
author: Maggie Gallagher

quote: It won't take 40 years for opposition to same-sex marriage to dissipate.
author: Mary Cheney

quote: I wasn't looking for another marriage. I had been married before. He is a nice man - a geologist, an Ernest Hemingway type. But Paul and I married because of convention.
author: Linda McCartney

quote: Even in the common affairs of life, in love, friendship, and marriage, how little security have we when we trust our happiness in the hands of others!
author: William Hazlitt

quote: I'm all for same-sex marriage.
author: Tori Spelling

quote: I haven't been faithful to my wife. Our marriage has been tainted with my infidelities. I was irresponsible.
author: David Boreanaz

quote: I don't think marriage is a civil right, but I think that being able to transfer property is a civil right.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Traditional marriage is what should be sanctioned.
author: Jeb Bush

quote: We can practice tolerance while still holding true to cultural values that protect the institution of marriage as a union between only a man and a woman.
author: Ken Calvert

quote: My decision to end my marriage was such a risk to lose ratings and lose my fan base. I had to take that risk for my inner peace and to be happy with myself.
author: Kim Kardashian

quote: My parents had an arranged marriage, as did so many other people when I was growing up. My father came and had a life in the United States one way and my mother had a different one, and I was very aware of those things. I continue to wonder about it, and I will continue to write about it.
author: Jhumpa Lahiri

quote: My mother had a son from previous marriage and her husband died in Second World War.
author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

quote: I suffered from a mild case of postpartum depression after my second child and the physical challenge of maintaining an overnight shift at CBS, a marriage, and two in diapers made the symptoms worse and everyone in the house paid the price.
author: Mika Brzezinski

quote: It was very difficult when I was trying to figure out how to have a marriage and babies and do this at the same time. There was no handbook. You were making it up as you went along.
author: Pat Benatar

quote: Marriage can be a magnificent lesson in becoming our best selves; that is true.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: I support same-sex marriage.
author: Anthony Foxx

quote: If the present Mrs. Wogan has a fault - and I must tread carefully here - if she has a fault, this gem in the diadem of womanhood is a hoarder. She never throws anything out. Which may explain the longevity of our marriage.
author: Terry Wogan

quote: I have an American son and an American partner, so marriage might logistically make sense at one point. My partner is a stay-at-home father, so if he wants to be on my health plan, or tax wise, or maybe on paper we want to have our I's dotted and our T's crossed, but emotionally, neither of us really feels the need for it.
author: Evangeline Lilly

quote: Only choose in marriage a man whom you would choose as a friend if he were a woman.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: The best way to get most husbands to do something is to suggest that perhaps they're too old to do it.
author: Ann Bancroft

quote: Finding good partners is the key to success in anything: in business, in marriage and, especially, in investing.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Instead of getting married again, I'm going to find a woman I don't like and give her a house.
author: Lewis Grizzard

quote: Take care of him. And make him feel important. And if you can do that, you'll have a happy and wonderful marriage. Like two out of every ten couples.
author: Neil Simon

quote: Marriage is the alliance of two people, one of whom never remembers birthdays and the other who never forgets them.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: All that a husband or wife really wants is to be pitied a little, praised a little, and appreciated a little.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Like everything which is not the involuntary result of fleeting emotion but the creation of time and will, any marriage, happy or unhappy, is infinitely more interesting than any romance, however passionate.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: Marriage is a difficult project. When seven years have passed and all your body's cells have been replaced, you're meant to experience that seven-year itch.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Whoever, fleeing marriage and the sorrows that women cause, does not wish to wed comes to a deadly old age.
author: Hesiod

quote: She's been married so many times she has rice marks on her face.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: Daddy was real gentle with kids. That's why I expected so much out of marriage, figuring that all men should be steady and pleasant.
author: Loretta Lynn

quote: I very much feel that marriage is a sacrament and that sacrament should extend... to that legal entity of a union between what traditionally in our Western values has been defined as between a man and a woman.
author: Bill Frist

quote: When a marriage works, nothing on earth can take its place.
author: Helen Gahagan

quote: A so-called happy marriage corresponds to love as a correct poem to an improvised song.
author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: Originally, I was against gay marriage because I was opposed to all marriage, being an old-fashioned gay bohemian. The straight people I knew in the sixties were very much opposed to it. I was, too, and it was never a possibility for gays, but when I saw how opposed the Religious Right was to it, I thought it a fight worth fighting.
author: Edmund White

quote: The Hindu marriage may be described as the union of two families. In this union, there is no room for petty ambitions and personal ego-trips. What is involved is love for the entire family that one is marrying into.
author: Dada Vaswani

quote: I had a realization in the midst of my happy marriage that I had kind of lost most of my friends - my male friends in particular. And I started wondering if my wife, who was certainly my best friend, supplanted those relationships.
author: Matthew Weiner

quote: The United States is in a time of transition. Courts have redefined marriage, and beliefs about human sexuality are changing. Will the right to dissent be protected? Will the right of Americans to speak and act in accord with what the United States had always believed about marriage - that it's a union of husband and wife - be tolerated?
author: Edwin Meese

quote: For the life of me, I don't understand what honest motive there is in putting this in front of this body to philosophically debate marriage on a constitutional amendment that is not going to happen, and which is enormously divisive in all of our communities.
author: Dianne Feinstein

quote: Sleeping together is a euphemism for people, but tantamount to marriage with cats.
author: Marge Piercy

quote: Marriage, if one will face the truth, is an evil, but a necessary evil.
author: Menander

quote: Political promises are much like marriage vows. They are made at the beginning of the relationship between candidate and voter, but are quickly forgotten.
author: Dick Gregory

quote: There may be people in my audience who may not agree with me on some particular issue - you know, say, as a gun owner, they may not agree with me, or, you know, someone may not agree with me on a gay marriage topic. Any of those things. But those shouldn't be the reasons you listen to my music.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: Every marriage tends to consist of an aristocrat and a peasant. Of a teacher and a learner.
author: John Updike

quote: We're used to boy meets girl, boy likes girl, instant attraction on TV. But you throw a son in there, you throw a marriage in there, and you've got some really good character stuff.
author: Matt Passmore

quote: The irrationality of disgust suggests it is unreliable as a source of moral insight. There may be good arguments against gay marriage, partial-birth abortions and human cloning, but the fact that some people find such acts to be disgusting should carry no weight.
author: Paul Bloom

quote: I made an awful mess of my first marriage. It was hard to live with me being me. I was so abnormal. I mean, most writers struggle. I hadn't struggled. I couldn't suddenly go down to the PEN Club and behave like a normal human being, because most of those guys were struggling to make a couple of thousand pounds a year.
author: John le Carre

quote: The Obama administration came into Utah and said, 'We're not going to listen to what the U.S. Supreme Court said. 'We, the federal government, are going to recognize marriages in the state of Utah and Utah state law explicitly does not recognize as marriage,' and that was really, in my view, an abuse of power.
author: Ted Cruz

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Happy is the man who finds a true friend, and far happier is he who finds that true friend in his wife.
author: Franz Schubert

quote: The real act of marriage takes place in the heart, not in the ballroom or church or synagogue. It's a choice you make - not just on your wedding day, but over and over again - and that choice is reflected in the way you treat your husband or wife.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
author: Julia Child

quote: My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Let the wife make the husband glad to come home, and let him make her sorry to see him leave.
author: Martin Luther

quote: I do believe that God blessed me in life with a wonderful family, a successful career, and a loving marriage, and remain thankful for that blessing.
author: Bonnie Tyler

quote: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: When a man opens a car door for his wife, it's either a new car or a new wife.
author: Prince Philip

quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years.
author: Simone Signoret

quote: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
author: Martin Luther

quote: A good husband makes a good wife.
author: John Florio

quote: A word of encouragement from a teacher to a child can change a life. A word of encouragement from a spouse can save a marriage. A word of encouragement from a leader can inspire a person to reach her potential.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: May this marriage be full of laughter, our every day in paradise.
author: Rumi

quote: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight, dinner, soft music and dancing. She goes Tuesdays, I go Fridays.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
author: Socrates

quote: Marriage, in its truest sense, is a partnership of equals, with neither exercising dominion over the other, but, rather, with each encouraging and assisting the other in whatever responsibilities and aspirations he or she might have.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: I believe marriage is between a man and a woman. I am not in favor of gay marriage. But when you start playing around with constitutions, just to prohibit somebody who cares about another person, it just seems to me that's not what America's about. Usually, our constitutions expand liberties, they don't contract them.
author: Barack Obama

quote: May these vows and this marriage be blessed.
author: Rumi

quote: A wedding is a funeral where you smell your own flowers.
author: Eddie Cantor

quote: One should believe in marriage as in the immortality of the soul.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Marriage is an act of will that signifies and involves a mutual gift, which unites the spouses and binds them to their eventual souls, with whom they make up a sole family - a domestic church.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: A successful marriage is an edifice that must be rebuilt every day.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: Marriage is the most natural state of man, and... the state in which you will find solid happiness.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Marriage is good for those who are afraid to sleep alone at night.
author: St. Jerome

quote: When marrying, ask yourself this question: Do you believe that you will be able to converse well with this person into your old age? Everything else in marriage is transitory.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Don't marry the person you think you can live with; marry only the individual you think you can't live without.
author: James Dobson

quote: Marriage is an alliance entered into by a man who can't sleep with the window shut, and a woman who can't sleep with the window open.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: I have learned that only two things are necessary to keep one's wife happy. First, let her think she's having her own way. And second, let her have it.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Friendship is the marriage of the soul, and this marriage is liable to divorce.
author: Voltaire

quote: A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: Ultimately, I believe the only secret to a happy marriage is choosing the right person. Life is a series of choices, right?
author: Michelle Pfeiffer

quote: When you make the sacrifice in marriage, you're sacrificing not to each other but to unity in a relationship.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Let us be honest with each other. The threat to marriage is not the gays. It is a lack of loving commitment - whether it is found in the form of neglect, indifference, cruelty or adultery, to name just a few manifestations of the loveless desert in which too many marriages come to grief.
author: Malcolm Turnbull

quote: Getting married, for me, was the best thing I ever did. I was suddenly beset with an immense sense of release, that we have something more important than our separate selves, and that is the marriage. There's immense happiness that can come from working towards that.
author: Nick Cave

quote: The secret to a happy marriage is if you can be at peace with someone within four walls, if you are content because the one you love is near to you, either upstairs or downstairs, or in the same room, and you feel that warmth that you don't find very often, then that is what love is all about.
author: Bruce Forsyth

quote: Marriage has made me a lot happier and I'm deeply in love with my wife, and I thank God for her every day.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: Marriage is a coming together for better or for worse, hopefully enduring, and intimate to the degree of being sacred.
author: William O. Douglas

quote: My mother and father had a terrible marriage. They celebrated their wedding anniversary one year with their friends. Why did they celebrate? Maybe because they had lasted so many years without killing each other.
author: Marina Abramovic

quote: The great secret of a successful marriage is to treat all disasters as incidents and none of the incidents as disasters.
author: Harold Nicolson

quote: A man in love is incomplete until he has married. Then he's finished.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: Marriage is a wonderful institution, but who wants to live in an institution?
author: Groucho Marx

quote: But marriage goes in waves. You've got to be patient. People bail and give up on their marriages way too early. They just don't put the work and the effort into it. You've got to suck up your ego a lot of times, because that can be a big downfall.
author: Anna Benson

quote: When I'm weak, you can be strong; when I'm strong, you can be weak. That's what I believe marriage is.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: A good marriage is one which allows for change and growth in the individuals and in the way they express their love.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: If you want to know how your girl will treat you after marriage, just listen to her talking to her little brother.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: To keep your marriage brimming, With love in the loving cup, Whenever you're wrong, admit it; Whenever you're right, shut up.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: Gay rights is just a matter of time. Look at the polls. Worrying about gay marriage, let alone gay civil unions or gay employment rights, is a middle-age issue. Young people just can't see the problem. At worst, gays are going to win this one just by waiting until the opposition dies off.
author: Gail Collins

quote: Marriage is about the most expensive way for the average man to get laundry done.
author: Burt Reynolds

quote: Well I don't know that I'm okay any more than anyone else is okay, I lead a happy life and a very full one - I have a happy marriage and my kids are all cheerful, and no one is finding fault with me, personally.
author: L. Ron Hubbard

quote: I'm not for gay marriage, but I'm not for discriminating against people.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I don't care how handsome or fabulous or funny the groom is, or how sweet and accommodating the bride, or vice versa. Marriage is hard.
author: Jenna McCarthy

quote: Love is not weakness. It is strong. Only the sacrament of marriage can contain it.
author: Boris Pasternak

quote: Marriage equality is not a choice. It is a legal right.
author: Cory Booker

quote: Marriage is neither heaven nor hell, it is simply purgatory.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Marriage is like a cage; one sees the birds outside desperate to get in, and those inside equally desperate to get out.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Wit is the sudden marriage of ideas which, before their union, were not perceived to have any relation.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Married men live longer than single men. But married men are a lot more willing to die.
author: Johnny Carson

quote: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: There were three of us in this marriage, so it was a bit crowded.
author: Princess Diana

quote: Marriage has a unique place because it speaks of an absolute faithfulness, a covenant between radically different persons, male and female; and so it echoes the absolute covenant of God with his chosen, a covenant between radically different partners.
author: Rowan Williams

quote: Nobody, man or woman, has ever wrecked a good marriage.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: You know, my friends, with what a brave carouse I made a Second Marriage in my house; favored old barren reason from my bed, and took the daughter of the vine to spouse.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: I respect the fact that many denominations have different points of view with respect to gay marriage and they can hold that in the sanctity in the place of their religion and not bless them or solemnize them.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Do you know what it means to come home at night to a woman who'll give you a little love, a little affection, a little tenderness? It means you're in the wrong house, that's what it means.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: In the face of love, everyone is equal. Let everyone have the freedom to love and to pursue their happiness. I am Tsai Ing-wen, and I support marriage equality.
author: Tsai Ing-wen

quote: The media seems to think only abortion and gay marriage are religious issues. Poverty is a moral issue, it's a faith issue, it's a religious issue.
author: Jim Wallis

quote: Same-sex marriage would eliminate entirely in law the basic idea of a mother and a father for every child. It would create a society which deliberately chooses to deprive a child of either a mother or a father.
author: Keith O'Brien

quote: I don't want to make any judgments, and I don't want to preach, but I'm hoping that marriage can work: that when people do fall in love, when people do find their soul mate, everyone sticks to it. It has the potential to be a very powerful thing, marriage.
author: Jonathan Silverman

quote: I love the concept of togetherness and the entwinement of marriage.
author: William Shatner

quote: But the key to our marriage is the capacity to give each other a break. And to realize that it's not how our similarities work together; it's how our differences work together.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: Marriage helps young couples to raise themselves towards God. The bond of marriage unites two souls so firmly that though they are physically two separate entities, their souls are merged into one harmonious whole.
author: Dada Vaswani

quote: If you want to sacrifice the admiration of many men for the criticism of one, go ahead, get married.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: People today expect too much from marriage. Getting married is really like taking on a big new job.
author: Rosamunde Pilcher

quote: Many women cut back what had to be done at home by redefining what the house, the marriage and, sometimes, what the child needs. One woman described a fairly common pattern: I do my half. I do half of his half, and the rest doesn't get done.
author: Arlie Russell Hochschild

quote: What is fascinating about marriage is why anyone wants to get married.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: Marriage may often be a stormy lake, but celibacy is almost always a muddy horse pond.
author: Thomas Love Peacock

quote: For me it's also - the music is equally as important. I mean I think as somebody who writes music, there just has to sort of be the marriage between both.
author: Katey Sagal

quote: I think that's one of the most difficult things in any marriage - in order to build anything, you must be together. You can't build anything over the telephone.
author: Julie London

quote: Marriage is the mother of the world. It preserves kingdoms, and fills cities and churches, and heaven itself.
author: Jeremy Taylor

quote: Sticking with a marriage. That's true grit, man.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: My grandparents got married at a very young age, and a lot of what I think about marriage is based on their relationship. I watched them over the years and saw how they dealt with everything together, as a team.
author: Kyle Chandler

quote: I have a lot of skepticism about marriage and monogamy.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: I am not married anymore. I hate marriage... but it's okay now.
author: Eric-Emmanuel Schmitt

quote: It only took one text message to change my life. That's when I discovered my loving husband had been unfaithful. His infidelities ended our marriage.
author: Garcelle Beauvais

quote: I am drawn to the mystery of marriage. You can never know what the contract is between two people, and that is a very strong subject. I think it may be my subject.
author: Mike Nichols

quote: I am a big, confident, happy woman who had a loving childhood, a pleasant career, and a wonderful marriage. I feel very lucky.
author: Maeve Binchy

quote: We need leaders who will stand unapologetically in defense of marriage.
author: Ted Cruz

quote: Marriage is about love, but it is not first and foremost about love. First and foremost, marriage is about continuity and transmission.
author: Meir Soloveichik

quote: The most happy marriage I can picture or imagine to myself would be the union of a deaf man to a blind woman.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: For my parents' generation, the idea was not that marriage was about some kind of idealized, romantic love; it was a partnership. It's about creating family; it's about creating offspring. Indian culture is essentially much more of a 'we' culture. It's a communal culture where you do what's best for the community - you procreate.
author: Aasif Mandvi

quote: I think men are mainly unfaithful because as they get older, they feel the urge to prove to themselves that they are still attractive. They need proof from outside the marriage. It's really sad. It's all about them. It's not about their wives at all.
author: Pattie Boyd

quote: My thoughts on gay marriage are that everyone has the right to love and be loved, and that's the position I take.
author: Nick Jonas

quote: So many people prefer to live in drama because it's comfortable. It's like someone staying in a bad marriage or relationship - it's actually easier to stay because they know what to expect every day, versus leaving and not knowing what to expect.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: As to marriage or celibacy, let a man take which course he will, he will be sure to repent.
author: Socrates

quote: Love: A temporary insanity curable by marriage.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: If you want to read about love and marriage, you've got to buy two separate books.
author: Alan King

quote: Marriage is a great institution, but I'm not ready for an institution.
author: Mae West

quote: I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: Marriage, for a woman at least, hampers the two things that made life to me glorious - friendship and learning.
author: Jane Harrison

quote: My wife is my soul mate. I can't imagine being without her.
author: Matt Damon

quote: Now that virtually every career is an option for ambitious girls, it can no longer be considered regressive or reactionary to reintroduce discussion of marriage and motherhood to primary education. We certainly do not want to return to the simplistic duality of home economics classes for girls and wood shop for boys.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: I liked the premise of this material. I love the marriage relationship. They kind of keep each other honest, and they enjoy each other's sense of humor. Kind of a sexy but boring relationship.
author: Patricia Arquette

quote: It is a full time job being honest one moment at a time, remembering to love, to honor, to respect. It is a practice, a discipline, worthy of every moment.
author: Jasmine Guy

quote: You're not just going out there, maybe sacrificing your own life. There's also sacrifices still going on at home. You can serve in the military and have a good marriage, but you just need to be aware of it so you can take those steps to take care of it.
author: Chris Kyle

quote: Marriage is not just spiritual communion, it is also remembering to take out the trash.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: A journey is like marriage. The certain way to be wrong is to think you control it.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: I married beneath me, all women do.
author: Nancy Astor

quote: I think long-lasting, healthy relationships are more important than the idea of marriage. At the root of every successful marriage is a strong partnership.
author: Carson Daly

quote: It's lovely being a parent and being in a strong marriage with somebody who is your best friend.
author: Johnny Vegas

quote: When the first fossils began to be found in eastern Africa, in the late 1950s, I thought, what a wonderful marriage this was, biology and anthropology. I was around 16 years old when I made this particular choice of academic pursuit.
author: Donald Johanson

quote: Well, my view before was a Western view, and I certainly understand marriage equality and civil rights, equal rights for all, but having visited developing nations and some of the poorest nations in the world, I realize how deep it goes and how much work really needs to be done to create equality for all.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: The problem for those who assert biblical authority in support of traditional definitions of marriage is that one could, with equal validity, assert that the lending of money or certain kinds of haircuts are forbidden by God, or that slavery and the subjugation of women are authorized by the Lord.
author: Jon Meacham

quote: The problem with marriage is that it ends every night after making love, and it must be rebuilt every morning before breakfast.
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: I opposed the Defense of Marriage Act in 1996. It should be repealed and I will vote for its repeal on the Senate floor. I will also oppose any proposal to amend the U.S. Constitution to ban gays and lesbians from marrying.
author: Barack Obama

quote: I'm 0 for 3 with marriage - the scoreboard doesn't lie, never has. So what we all have is a marriage of the heart. To sully or contaminate or radically disrespect this union with a shameful contract is something that I will leave to the amateurs and the Bible grippers.
author: Charlie Sheen

quote: If I get married, I want to be very married.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: I think women are natural caretakers. They take care of everybody. They take care of their husbands and their kids and their dogs, and don't spend a lot of time just getting back and taking time out.
author: Reese Witherspoon

quote: All married couples should learn the art of battle as they should learn the art of making love. Good battle is objective and honest - never vicious or cruel. Good battle is healthy and constructive, and brings to a marriage the principles of equal partnership.
author: Ann Landers

quote: Sensual pleasures have the fleeting brilliance of a comet; a happy marriage has the tranquillity of a lovely sunset.
author: Ann Landers

quote: I think the best thing I can do is to be a distraction. A husband lives and breathes his work all day long. If he comes home to more table thumping, how can the poor man ever relax?
author: Jackie Kennedy

quote: Marrying for love may be a bit risky, but it is so honest that God can't help but smile on it.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Before marriage, a girl has to make love to a man to hold him. After marriage, she has to hold him to make love to him.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Next month, I will celebrate my 30th anniversary of marriage with my beautiful bride, Vicki. Our marriage has been a blessing. I have gained even more respect for the institution over the past 3 decades and will defend it against attack.
author: Todd Tiahrt

quote: Mama and Daddy King represent the best in manhood and womanhood, the best in a marriage, the kind of people we are trying to become.
author: Coretta Scott King

quote: Olympism is the marriage of sport and culture.
author: Juan Antonio Samaranch

quote: I've always been suspicious of TV, I've always found music and video to be an unhappy marriage.
author: Keith Richards

quote: In marriage do thou be wise: prefer the person before money, virtue before beauty, the mind before the body; then thou hast a wife, a friend, a companion, a second self.
author: William Penn

quote: Bachelors know more about women than married men; if they didn't they'd be married too.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Marriage is a gamble, let's be honest.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: The possibility of divorce renders both marriage partners stricter in their observance of the duties they owe to each other. Divorces help to improve morals and to increase the population.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: I know one husband and wife who, whatever the official reasons given to the court for the break up of their marriage, were really divorced because the husband believed that nobody ought to read while he was talking and the wife that nobody ought to talk while she was reading.
author: Vera Brittain

quote: The president strongly believes that marriage in this country ought to be between a man and a woman. He also believes it is something that ought to be decided by the people. He doesn't believe that judges ought to impose their will on the people.
author: Ken Mehlman

quote: Europe, which gave us the idea of same-sex marriage, is a dying society, with birthrates 50 percent below replacement.
author: Maggie Gallagher

quote: It won't take 40 years for opposition to same-sex marriage to dissipate.
author: Mary Cheney

quote: I wasn't looking for another marriage. I had been married before. He is a nice man - a geologist, an Ernest Hemingway type. But Paul and I married because of convention.
author: Linda McCartney

quote: Even in the common affairs of life, in love, friendship, and marriage, how little security have we when we trust our happiness in the hands of others!
author: William Hazlitt

quote: I'm all for same-sex marriage.
author: Tori Spelling

quote: I haven't been faithful to my wife. Our marriage has been tainted with my infidelities. I was irresponsible.
author: David Boreanaz

quote: I don't think marriage is a civil right, but I think that being able to transfer property is a civil right.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Traditional marriage is what should be sanctioned.
author: Jeb Bush

quote: We can practice tolerance while still holding true to cultural values that protect the institution of marriage as a union between only a man and a woman.
author: Ken Calvert

quote: My decision to end my marriage was such a risk to lose ratings and lose my fan base. I had to take that risk for my inner peace and to be happy with myself.
author: Kim Kardashian

quote: My parents had an arranged marriage, as did so many other people when I was growing up. My father came and had a life in the United States one way and my mother had a different one, and I was very aware of those things. I continue to wonder about it, and I will continue to write about it.
author: Jhumpa Lahiri

quote: My mother had a son from previous marriage and her husband died in Second World War.
author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

quote: I suffered from a mild case of postpartum depression after my second child and the physical challenge of maintaining an overnight shift at CBS, a marriage, and two in diapers made the symptoms worse and everyone in the house paid the price.
author: Mika Brzezinski

quote: It was very difficult when I was trying to figure out how to have a marriage and babies and do this at the same time. There was no handbook. You were making it up as you went along.
author: Pat Benatar

quote: Marriage can be a magnificent lesson in becoming our best selves; that is true.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: I support same-sex marriage.
author: Anthony Foxx

quote: If the present Mrs. Wogan has a fault - and I must tread carefully here - if she has a fault, this gem in the diadem of womanhood is a hoarder. She never throws anything out. Which may explain the longevity of our marriage.
author: Terry Wogan

quote: I have an American son and an American partner, so marriage might logistically make sense at one point. My partner is a stay-at-home father, so if he wants to be on my health plan, or tax wise, or maybe on paper we want to have our I's dotted and our T's crossed, but emotionally, neither of us really feels the need for it.
author: Evangeline Lilly

quote: Only choose in marriage a man whom you would choose as a friend if he were a woman.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: The best way to get most husbands to do something is to suggest that perhaps they're too old to do it.
author: Ann Bancroft

quote: Finding good partners is the key to success in anything: in business, in marriage and, especially, in investing.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: I have always maintained a strong opposition to marriage because I would have to be in serious denial to pretend I wasn't born with a personality for divorce. Whatever the opposite of amicable is, that's how my breakups tend to play out.
author: Chelsea Handler

quote: More belongs to marriage than four legs in a bed.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: In mid-life the man wants to see how irresistible he still is to younger women. How they turn their hearts to stone and more or less commit a murder of their marriage I just don't know, but they do.
author: Earl Warren

quote: Nothing in life is as good as the marriage of true minds between man and woman. As good? It is life itself.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: I'm certain that most couples expect to find intimacy in marriage, but it somehow eludes them.
author: James Dobson

quote: I have no difficulty with the recognition of civil unions for non-traditional relationships but I believe in law we should protect the traditional definition of marriage.
author: Stephen Harper

quote: Our national media refuses to report that even the Supreme Court did not say marriage was a human right in all cases nor did it say that the heterosexual definition violated anyone's right or that the heterosexual definition of marriage was unconstitutional.
author: Stockwell Day

quote: Marriage is the tomb of love.
author: Giacomo Casanova

quote: It was the courts, of course, that took away prayer from our schools, that took away Bible reading from our schools. It's the courts that gave us same-sex marriage. So it is quite a battlefield, and the Supreme Court is the highest court in the land.
author: Rod Parsley

quote: The submission of her body without love or desire is degrading to the woman's finer sensibility, all the marriage certificates on earth to the contrary notwithstanding.
author: Margaret Sanger

quote: I'm a heathen when it comes to marriage.
author: Greta Scacchi

quote: Marriage requires a special talent, like acting. Monogamy requires genius.
author: Warren Beatty

quote: Never stay in a bad marriage, and don't hang around with psycho coke fiends.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: I don't know of many evangelicals who want to deny gay couples their legal rights. However, most of us don't want to call it marriage, because we think that word has religious connotations, and we're not ready to see it used in ways that offend us.
author: Tony Campolo

quote: It is sad that the Republican leadership is not as interested as they say they are in protecting the institution of marriage as they are in waging a campaign to divide and distract the American people from the real issues that need to be addressed.
author: Kendrick Meek

quote: Always remember that the most important thing in a good marriage is not happiness, but stability.
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: Courtship is to marriage, as a very witty prologue to a very dull play.
author: William Congreve

quote: A bride at her second marriage does not wear a veil. She wants to see what she is getting.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: Marriage is the grave or tomb of wit.
author: Margaret Cavendish

quote: The first breath of adultery is the freest; after it, constraints aping marriage develop.
author: John Updike

quote: Today the House has a chance to give 25 million married couples the best Valentine's Day gift possible, elimination from the most unfair of taxes, the marriage tax penalty.
author: Jerry Weller

quote: Another argument, vaguer and even less persuasive, is that gay marriage somehow does harm to heterosexual marriage. I have yet to meet anyone who can explain to me what this means. In what way would allowing same-sex partners to marry diminish the marriages of heterosexual couples?
author: Ted Olson

quote: The mark of a good marriage is partnership and continuing to feel inspired by your spouse. I had that with Tao. But the end is not necessarily the tragedy. Staying in a relationship that is no longer working is the tragedy. Living unhappily - that's the tragedy.
author: Olivia Wilde

quote: Straight couples don't have to be monogamous to be married or married to be monogamous. Monogamy no more defines marriage than the presence of children does. Monogamy isn't compulsory and its absence doesn't invalidate a marriage.
author: Dan Savage

quote: I believe in traditional marriage and I believe in the Defense of Marriage Act.
author: Herman Cain

quote: I have not supported same-sex marriage. I have supported civil partnerships and contractual relationships.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: Instead of getting married again, I'm going to find a woman I don't like and give her a house.
author: Lewis Grizzard

quote: Take care of him. And make him feel important. And if you can do that, you'll have a happy and wonderful marriage. Like two out of every ten couples.
author: Neil Simon

quote: Marriage is the alliance of two people, one of whom never remembers birthdays and the other who never forgets them.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: All that a husband or wife really wants is to be pitied a little, praised a little, and appreciated a little.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Like everything which is not the involuntary result of fleeting emotion but the creation of time and will, any marriage, happy or unhappy, is infinitely more interesting than any romance, however passionate.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: Marriage is a difficult project. When seven years have passed and all your body's cells have been replaced, you're meant to experience that seven-year itch.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Whoever, fleeing marriage and the sorrows that women cause, does not wish to wed comes to a deadly old age.
author: Hesiod

quote: She's been married so many times she has rice marks on her face.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: Daddy was real gentle with kids. That's why I expected so much out of marriage, figuring that all men should be steady and pleasant.
author: Loretta Lynn

quote: I very much feel that marriage is a sacrament and that sacrament should extend... to that legal entity of a union between what traditionally in our Western values has been defined as between a man and a woman.
author: Bill Frist

quote: When a marriage works, nothing on earth can take its place.
author: Helen Gahagan

quote: A so-called happy marriage corresponds to love as a correct poem to an improvised song.
author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: Originally, I was against gay marriage because I was opposed to all marriage, being an old-fashioned gay bohemian. The straight people I knew in the sixties were very much opposed to it. I was, too, and it was never a possibility for gays, but when I saw how opposed the Religious Right was to it, I thought it a fight worth fighting.
author: Edmund White

quote: The Hindu marriage may be described as the union of two families. In this union, there is no room for petty ambitions and personal ego-trips. What is involved is love for the entire family that one is marrying into.
author: Dada Vaswani

quote: I had a realization in the midst of my happy marriage that I had kind of lost most of my friends - my male friends in particular. And I started wondering if my wife, who was certainly my best friend, supplanted those relationships.
author: Matthew Weiner

quote: The United States is in a time of transition. Courts have redefined marriage, and beliefs about human sexuality are changing. Will the right to dissent be protected? Will the right of Americans to speak and act in accord with what the United States had always believed about marriage - that it's a union of husband and wife - be tolerated?
author: Edwin Meese

quote: For the life of me, I don't understand what honest motive there is in putting this in front of this body to philosophically debate marriage on a constitutional amendment that is not going to happen, and which is enormously divisive in all of our communities.
author: Dianne Feinstein

quote: Sleeping together is a euphemism for people, but tantamount to marriage with cats.
author: Marge Piercy

quote: Marriage, if one will face the truth, is an evil, but a necessary evil.
author: Menander

quote: Political promises are much like marriage vows. They are made at the beginning of the relationship between candidate and voter, but are quickly forgotten.
author: Dick Gregory

quote: There may be people in my audience who may not agree with me on some particular issue - you know, say, as a gun owner, they may not agree with me, or, you know, someone may not agree with me on a gay marriage topic. Any of those things. But those shouldn't be the reasons you listen to my music.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: Every marriage tends to consist of an aristocrat and a peasant. Of a teacher and a learner.
author: John Updike

quote: We're used to boy meets girl, boy likes girl, instant attraction on TV. But you throw a son in there, you throw a marriage in there, and you've got some really good character stuff.
author: Matt Passmore

quote: The irrationality of disgust suggests it is unreliable as a source of moral insight. There may be good arguments against gay marriage, partial-birth abortions and human cloning, but the fact that some people find such acts to be disgusting should carry no weight.
author: Paul Bloom

quote: I made an awful mess of my first marriage. It was hard to live with me being me. I was so abnormal. I mean, most writers struggle. I hadn't struggled. I couldn't suddenly go down to the PEN Club and behave like a normal human being, because most of those guys were struggling to make a couple of thousand pounds a year.
author: John le Carre

quote: The Obama administration came into Utah and said, 'We're not going to listen to what the U.S. Supreme Court said. 'We, the federal government, are going to recognize marriages in the state of Utah and Utah state law explicitly does not recognize as marriage,' and that was really, in my view, an abuse of power.
author: Ted Cruz

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Happy is the man who finds a true friend, and far happier is he who finds that true friend in his wife.
author: Franz Schubert

quote: The real act of marriage takes place in the heart, not in the ballroom or church or synagogue. It's a choice you make - not just on your wedding day, but over and over again - and that choice is reflected in the way you treat your husband or wife.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
author: Julia Child

quote: My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Let the wife make the husband glad to come home, and let him make her sorry to see him leave.
author: Martin Luther

quote: I do believe that God blessed me in life with a wonderful family, a successful career, and a loving marriage, and remain thankful for that blessing.
author: Bonnie Tyler

quote: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: When a man opens a car door for his wife, it's either a new car or a new wife.
author: Prince Philip

quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years.
author: Simone Signoret

quote: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
author: Martin Luther

quote: A good husband makes a good wife.
author: John Florio

quote: A word of encouragement from a teacher to a child can change a life. A word of encouragement from a spouse can save a marriage. A word of encouragement from a leader can inspire a person to reach her potential.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: May this marriage be full of laughter, our every day in paradise.
author: Rumi

quote: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight, dinner, soft music and dancing. She goes Tuesdays, I go Fridays.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
author: Socrates

quote: Marriage, in its truest sense, is a partnership of equals, with neither exercising dominion over the other, but, rather, with each encouraging and assisting the other in whatever responsibilities and aspirations he or she might have.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: I believe marriage is between a man and a woman. I am not in favor of gay marriage. But when you start playing around with constitutions, just to prohibit somebody who cares about another person, it just seems to me that's not what America's about. Usually, our constitutions expand liberties, they don't contract them.
author: Barack Obama
